testcase.name: this scenario will Put or Update a job description to the database
testcase.system-out: Given url 'https://jobapplicationjwt.herokuapp.com/' ...................... passed And def Token = call read('GenerateToken.feature') ........................ passed Given path 'auth/webapi/update' ........................................... passed And request ............................................................... passed And headers {Accept: 'application/json', Content-Type: 'application/json', Authorization: '#("Bearer " + Token.token)'} . passed When method Put ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And print response ........................................................ passed
